faq.question: How do I submit my assignments?
faq.answer: Assignments can be submitted through the course portal on our website.

faq.question: What is the policy on late assignments?
faq.answer: Late assignments will be accepted with a 10% deduction per day.

faq.question: What is the refund policy?
faq.answer: Refunds will be issued within 14 days of the start of the course, minus a $50 processing fee.

faq.question: What is the attendance policy?
faq.answer: Attendance is mandatory for all classes. More than 2 absences will result in a grade reduction.

faq.question: How can I access the course materials?
faq.answer: You can access the course materials by logging into the e-learning platform and navigating to the course page. From there, you will find a link to the course materials.

faq.question: What is the format of the course?
faq.answer: The course is offered in an online format, with video lectures, quizzes, and interactive activities.

faq.question: What is the duration of the course?
faq.answer: The course is self-paced and you can complete it at your own schedule, but it is estimated to take around 8 weeks to complete.

faq.question: Is there a deadline to complete the course?
faq.answer: The course is self-paced, and there is no specific deadline to complete it. But it is recommended to complete the course within a year.

faq.question: Is there a certificate provided after completion of the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate of completion will be provided upon successfully completing the course and passing the final assessment.

faq.question: What are the system requirements for the course?
faq.answer: The course can be accessed on any device with an internet connection and a modern web browser. You will also need a microphone and camera if you plan to participate in live video sessions.
